summary:
This mod edits Ghorza gra-Bagol, the blacksmith in
Markarth (and a potential spouse)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][font=Verdana][size=4][center][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][/font][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][/size][/font][/size]Mirz's NPC Replacer Ghorza gra-Bagol[/center][center][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]
[/size][/font][/size][/center][/size][/font][/b][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][center]
Description
===========

This mod edits [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Ghorza_gra-Bagol]Ghorza gra-Bagol[/url], the blacksmith in Markarth and a potential spouse.
[size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]I tried to make her prettier, but still looking like an orc:)[/size][/font][/size][/size][/font][/size][/size][/font][/size]


Details
=======

-New custom skin and face textures, eyes, brows and hair
-Edited face shape
-Changed iron dagger to orcish mace
-Made her younger looking and changed hair color to black
[size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][/size][/font][/size][/size][/font][/size]
Please add screenshots and come back to endorse if you like my mod :)


Incompatibility
===============

Conflict with mods that edits Ghorza gra-Bagol.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

-If you have met her before you install this, she might still have her old weapon and not the orcish mace.
 You can fix it with the console: Walk close to her, open console, click her, type resetinventory,
 hit enter (Not fully tested but should work)

Let me know if you find any bugs, so I can try to fix them.


Requirements
============

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] (esp not needed)
[size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]Any body replacer that works with UNP textures
(Check sticky post in comments for a workaround if you use CBBE)


Recommended mods
================

SKSE
ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11371/?]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all by 83Willow[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation by towawot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]RUSTIC CLOTHING by Gamwich[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31593/?]Mitigate HDR Eye Adaptation and disable Bloom by carpetbulge[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?]Immersive HUD - iHUD by Gopher[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?]True Storms - Thunder and Rain Redone by fadingsignal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/?]Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics by Megaloblast and Kojak747[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI by SkyUI Team[/url]


History
=======

v1.0 11.05.2017 - Initial release
v1.1 12.05.2017 - Updated facegen texture file to remove neckseam
[/size][/font][/size][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2]v1.2 12.05.2017 - Updated facegen texture and detailmap file to remove neckseam[/size][/font][/size][/size][/font][/size] again
